alert.note: Alert for Hansford; Sherman (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 9:54PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Texas, western Hansford and eastern Sherman Counties through 1030 PM CDT... At 954 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles east of Eva to 4 miles northeast of Sunray. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Guymon, Goodwell, Morse, Hough and Texhoma. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
